data.text: It is fun. There are endless games, activites, and challenges to entertain the whole room
It thrives off of creativity. No where else will you see a basketball fish or a finger light switch
He earned a Bachelors in Physical Education from ASU and has taught for too many years (33)
He takes care of his wife, daughter, two stepsons, two little dogs, and a Saint Bernard
He writes and performs songs with his guitar when he is not hiking or working on his cabin
